title: [Resolved] I can't even purchase RP
body:
Whenever im trying to purchase RP by Master Card but it seems like i can't purchase that. I have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Any1 got the same prob?
Pls tell me how can i purchase RP 
Thks for ur time!

replies.body: im haveing this issue too but its saying to check my card details and try again, i have and its correct, i also rang the bank to see if it was an issue on there end, they told me it must be an issue with riots end

Hey there,

Usually this means you've exceeded the maximum number of purchases for the next 24 hours, if you haven't, or it has been over 24+ hours since you first received the error then you may need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for assistance as they're the only ones who can help with account related issues.
I already submitted a ticket.  So  how long i gotta wait ?

Support is currently backed up, you should expect an initial reply within 24-48 hours.

Please do not reply to your ticket or create another until you've received a reply as this will push you back to the end of the ticket queue and delay a response even further.
